first_title: Collaborate With People Around The World

post.second_title: Sign Up To Create A Gathering

content.first: Focallocal is an open, welcoming community of thousands of positive people around the world.
content.second: Since 2012 we have been coming together and targeting the root causes of any, and all societal issues.
content.third: Sharing ideas, and using fun activities to empower people to build a friendlier, happier more connected future for everyone.
content.fourth: Join us and turn Public Happiness into a daily habit to explore your power to change the world, and the happiness it'll bring into your life

items.smiley: make the world happier every day
items.friends: make + meet positive friends all over the world
items.share: share + learn skills for your career or building change

content.first: You'll be a part of a growing global Movement with a plan to change the world
content.second: Meeting positive, pro-active, awesome new friends both locally, and globally
content.third: Together using simple, fun activities and exploring new ideas to shape friendlier, happier communities
content.fourth: Bringing peace and well-being to everyone, everywhere
